about_the_game:
Just as intense as the action itself, the Official Super Bomb Rush! Soundtrack is here!

Featured Tracks:

  • daPlaque - Dream
  • daPlaque - GG
  • daPlaque - Ultimate
  • Dekron - Time Machine
  • DOCTOR VOX - Hero
  • DOCTOR VOX - Level Up
  • Extan - Faster Than Light
  • From The Dust - Alive
  • From The Dust - Solstice
  • From The Dust - Supernova
  • Hellberg - Slumber Party
  • Hinkik - Explorers
  • Hinkik - Skystrike
  • Inaki - Phoenix
  • Inova - Seamonster
  • Krewella - Party Monster
  • KuroKibo - Artha
  • Last Call - ft. Repel The Robot
  • Marc Virus & Raya S - Nightfall
  • MAY - Terminus
  • Mike Chino - Dream Chaser
  • Romos - Cartharsis
  • Romos - Helios
  • SirensCeol - Unlimited Pancakes
  • Skyberyl - Animate
  • Subtact - Anomaly
  • Synx & ParanorMeow - Sinking In
  • Tarpey - Conglomerate
  • TheFatRat - Windfall
  • Wontolla - The White Stag
